summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is approaching an intersection. Initially, a blue car is seen moving from the left side towards the right side of the intersection. Later, a red car appears from the left side and moves towards the center of the intersection. Finally, a motorcycle with two riders falls in the middle of the intersection, creating a potential hazard.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is approaching the intersection at a steady speed. The driver needs to be cautious due to the presence of moving vehicles and the fallen motorcycle in the intersection. The vehicles speed is likely to decrease to avoid any collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A blue car, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the right side of the intersection. 2) Left side: A red car, approximately 8 meters away, moving towards the center of the intersection. 3) Front: A motorcycle with two riders, approximately 5 meters away, fallen in the middle of the intersection, creating a potential hazard.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. A motorcyclist is lying on the road in front of the vehicle, causing a potential hazard. The motorcyclist appears to be injured and is not moving. The vehicle ahead is slowing down and stopping, likely due to the motorcyclist on the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down and preparing to stop to avoid hitting the motorcyclist lying on the road. The vehicle ahead is also slowing down and stopping, indicating a potential emergency situation.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcyclist lying on the road, approximately 5 meters away, causing the vehicle to slow down and prepare to stop. 2) Front: A grey car, approximately 10 meters away, slowing down and stopping due to the motorcyclist on the road.
